title: The Magician
description: After fleeing Ojai, Nicholas, Sophie, Josh, and Scatty emerge in Paris, the City of Lights. Home for Nicholas Flamel. Only this homecoming is anything but sweet. Perenell is still locked up back in Alcatraz and Paris is teeming with enemies. Nicollo Machiavelli, immortal author and celebrated art collector, is working for Dee. Hes after them, and time is running out for Nicholas and Perenell. For every day spent without the Book of Abraham the Mage, they age one yeartheir magic becoming weaker and their bodies more frail. For Flamel, the Prophesy is becoming more and more clear.
author: Michael Scott
